
= Introduction =

This project aims to serve as a template for J2EE web applications. Several open source frameworks that address common problems/requirements of Java based web development are integrated:
  * Spring MVC
  * Spring Webflow
  * Freemarker
  * Hibernate/JPA
  * Acegi
  * Sitemesh

Petclinic plus is based on the petclinic sample application that is shipped with the
Spring Framework.
